configs.set: Learn to detect and track animals, zombies and other players that are nearby and never go hungry or run low on supplies.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Become the unsuprisable zombie slayer. You have grown tired of getting ambushed by zombies so now you can detect zombies and zombified animals.
Become the best player killer. While crouched you can now only detect other players that are moving nearby.
